select cd.DETAIL_ID, cd.DETAIL_NUM, cd.DETAIL_DATE, cd.DETAIL_EXPLAIN, cd.AMOUNT, cd.PAY_TYPE, cd.BALANCE, cd.PAY_CLASS, cd.PAY_EXPLAIN, cd.BILL_NUM, cd.REMARK, cd.CARD_ID, cd.REAL_AMOUNT, ci.CARD_NAME, ci.CARD_NUM, ci.CARD_OWNER, ci.CARD_BANK, ci.CARD_STATE, pro.PROJECT_NAME, pro.PROJECT_TYPE, pro.PROJECT_STATE, (select sum(dr.RETURN_AMOUNT) from deposit_return dr where dr.DETAIL_ID = cd.DETAIL_ID ) RETURN_AMOUNT_SUM from card_detail cd left join deposit_manage dm on dm.DETAIL_ID = cd.DETAIL_ID left join card_info ci on ci.CARD_ID = dm.CARD_ID left join project_info pro on pro.PROJECT_ID = dm.PROJECT_ID where cd.PAY_TYPE = '01' and cd.PAY_CLASS = '02'
and cd.DETAIL_NUM like CONCAT('%',#{DETAIL_NUM},'%')
and pro.PROJECT_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{PROJECT_NAME},'%')
and pro.PROJECT_TYPE = #{PROJECT_TYPE}
and pro.PROJECT_STATE = #{PROJECT_STATE}
and ci.CARD_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{CARD_NAME},'%')
and ci.CARD_NUM like CONCAT('%',#{CARD_NUM},'%')
